title: Undead Nights Eleven 99
description: The men and women of Knights Private Security showed up to work expecting a normal routine night. Except after September 16th, things would never be normal again. Through the ashes of the 'Rabies Flu' pandemic, the world would emerge a dark, desolate, and violent place. Follow the survivors at Knights Private Security as they struggle through the early hours of what Historians have since dubbed, Z-Day.
author: William Ferguson
